messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: Ensure that the img element's alt text serves the same purpose and presents the same information as the image.

messageLog.heading: NOTICE
messageLog.description: If this image cannot be fully described in a short text alternative, ensure a long text alternative is also available, such as in the body text or through a link.
